content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs per my latest command, I browsed the website https://www.euroace.net/ to find out what types of language courses Euroace offers. Euroace offers group and private Spanish courses, online Spanish courses, and DELE preparation courses. They also offer specific Spanish courses, internships, gap year programs, custom study abroad programs, high school programs, and soccer programs.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: Maximo Nivel offers intensive and effective Spanish immersion programs in Latin America and online. \n \n Links: ['Skip to content (https://maximonivel.com/#content)', 'Reviews (https://maximonivel.com/testimonials/)', 'Destinations (https://maximonivel.com/destinations/)', 'Groups (https://maximonivel.com/groups/)', 'Payment Guarantee (https://maximonivel.com/)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.greenhearttravel.org/programs/language-learning", "question": "What types of language programs does Greenheart Travel offer?"}}}'}]
"""
